field.name: _id
field.type: int(11) NOT NULL Primary Key auto_increment

xmlmeta.help: Marks this field to editable in list format.
Input type defines what data is allowed and what the input field looks like and acts like.

xmlmeta.dvals: Letters Only,Letters and Numbers Only,Email Address,Hex Color,Integers,Decimals,Any Real Number,Phone Number,Time of Day,Social Security Number,Zip Code
xmlmeta.help: Specify a mask/filter to apply to this field. Select from the list of create your own using regular expressions.
Help to show in the status bar when the field has focus and to show in this popup window.
Max number of characters to allow for input.
Height of the input field. Defaults to 20.

xmlmeta.formfields: tablename fieldname displayname inputtype width height inputmax required editlist mask behavior onchange tvals dvals defaultval help

xmlmeta.dvals: select name from _pages order by name,_id

xmlmeta.help: Used to determine the sort order of the pages.
Name of page. Must be unique.
Name of page to publish to if a publish is requested (eg. /index.html or /products/test.html).

xmlmeta.dvals: select name,_id from _templates order by name,_id
xmlmeta.help: Template to view this page through.
